    Function reference

    All functions

    CDS.HN.fx.denom()
    Support function for CDS.HN.lik
    CDS.HN.fx()
    Support function for CDS.HN.lik
    CDS.HN.lik()
    Likelihood of half-normal CDS detection function
    CDS.HR.fx.denom()
    Support function for CDS.HR.lik
    CDS.HR.fx()
    Support function for CDS.HR.lik
    CDS.HR.lik()
    Likelihood of hazard rate CDS detection function
    detfn()
    Distance sampling detection function
    estimate.Phat()
    Utility function to estimate detection probability given joint likelihood parameter estimates
    full.lik.fx.HN()
    Combined likelihood with half normal detection and half normal gradient
    full.lik.fx.HR()
    Combined likelihood with hazard rate detection and half normal gradient
    fx.denom()
    Component of combined likelihood with HN detection
    fx.denomHR()
    Support function for full.lik.fx.HR
    fx()
    Support function for full.lik.fx.HN
    fxHR()
    Support function for full.lik.fx.HR
    GPSpoints
    Locations of telemetered animals
    likdensity()
    Likelihood function to estimate parameters of the density gradient
    nonstratified_farrar
    Data from line transect survey of kangaroos
    pi.x.den()
    Component to modelling the density gradient
    pi.x()
    One form of modelling the density gradient
    size.bias()
    Compute size-bias adjusted group size estimates
    survey.design.summary()
    Extract information about a distance sampling survey from survey data frame
    varbootstrap()
    Variance estimation via bootstrap over transects

    Developed by Tiago Marques, Eric Rexstad.
